fixes.name: Posgrado no concluido
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR DistinctIDs = VALUES('TABLA FINAL_ Encuesta_Transpues (Varias conexiones)'[Número de cédula:])
RETURN
SUMX(
    DistinctIDs,
    VAR HasNo = CALCULATE(
        COUNTROWS('TABLA FINAL_ Encuesta_Transpues (Varias conexiones)'),
        'TABLA FINAL_ Encuesta_Transpues (Varias conexiones)'[Posgrado concluido] = "No"
    )
    RETURN IF(HasNo > 0, 1, 0)
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the FIXED LOD that performs COUNTD(IF [Posgrado concluido] = "No" THEN 1 END) per [Número de cédula:] into a measure. The measure iterates distinct Número de cédula:, uses CALCULATE to check if any row for that ID has Posgrado concluido = "No" (countrows > 0), returns 1 for that ID if true, and sums those results to produce the total.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The original Tableau expression uses a FIXED LOD ({ FIXED ... }), which is an aggregation/context-based calculation; per rules it must be implemented as a measure.
